articles.title: Updated LA County travel advisory expected to be issued Monday - KABC-TV
articles.description: Following the lead of federal health officials, Los Angeles County revised its COVID-19 travel advisory, lifting the mandate for fully vaccinated travelers to quarantine upon their return to the county.
